properties.areaDesc: Laguna Madre From 5 nm North Of Port Mansfield To Baffin Bay TX; Laguna Madre From the Port Of Brownsville to the Arroyo Colorado; Laguna Madre From The Arroyo Colorado To 5 NM North Of Port Mansfield TX; Coastal waters from Baffin Bay to Port Mansfield TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Port Mansfield TX to the Rio Grande River out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued January 15 at 7:44AM CST by NWS Brownsville TX
properties.description:
Observational webcams and satellite imagery confirms that areas
of fog are in place over the Laguna Madre and the Gulf waters
immediately adjacent to the coast. Marine visibility will be
reduced to between one to three nautical miles, with isolated
areas of thicker fog, possibly reducing visibility to one half of
a mile or less.

Mariners are urged to navigate with caution in the fog,
especially in nearshore areas and in the vicinity of jetties and
bridges.

NWSheadline: MARINE FOG THIS MORNING OVER COASTAL AREAS
